author: Richard Lowery
comment: Cute little watch face. My only requests would be...  1) The option to have the full time displayed as it can take me a while to work out which doctor is which.  2) To be able to change/add additional information to the screen. i.e. Battery life, steps, etc...  3) Some nice regeneration effects when doctors switch over.

author: N. Eric Phillips
comment: I love this watch face. The artwork is cool, and perfect for a real Whovian like me.   Question: what time is it when the clock strikes the 13th Doctor? Time to get a new watch! LOL

author: Tammy M
comment: I love this watch face so much!  I'm a very big fan of new Who. Tragically, I constantly get confused on the old Who, so I'm a little lost in the early afternoon. I'll learn them eventually though.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content:
hahaha same here... there's only one solution:
GOTTA WATCH THE OLD SERIES!!! xD

author: The Doctor
comment: It works brilliantly on my wife's Gear S2 just wish it was available for my Gear S. From using her watch to load it it looks amazing and the doctors look even better than on the pebble. I was a fan of the black and white doctors on the pebble though. Also big shout out to the developer, who is always more than willing to help

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content:
Thanks mate!
TIZEN programming is still a bit tricky for me, but as soon as I understand it better I'll try to make it available for other Gear watches as well (and the update for the S2 to fix the current bugs, well most of them anyways, should be through within the next couple of days) :)

title: Works brilliantly

author: Jay Powell
comment: Nothing wrong with this at all. I personally like faces with more info, like battery life and weather and such. But i love the litte doctors so much. It's worth an extra simple face to get such a fun and cool watch face for a true whovian.
title: Love it

author: Michael P
comment: Super fun app! Now when people ask me the time, I say "10 past Matt Smith!" Girlfriend broke up with me, but that's ok, at least I have this cool app!

author: Chris Cooney
comment: I cant even view the app

author: Kev Keith
comment: An option to remove additional characters would be good. But still fantastic.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: My programming skills got a bit rusty over the last weeks, but I'm still on it, I swear :D

author: Chris Lefebvre
comment: Works great on the LG G Watch.
title: Very nice

author: B Bell
comment: Just not for me. But good art style.

author: Antony Stephens
comment: Love it, now I have to remember which doctor is which :-)

author: L. Torres
comment: Perfect for any doctor who fan
title: Love this watchface

author: Julie Colman
comment: Love it.  Just wish it was  customizable.

author: Kristina Robinson
comment: Love it!!

author: Clarence Moore
comment: Awesome.

author: Ally Kat
comment: This app does not appear in Android Wear, on the watch, or in the App drawer. How is ome supposed to use it?

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: hey! this watchface is for android wear versions 5.x+, therefore the only explanation why it is not appearing on your watch could be that your watch still runs on android wear 4.xx. what watch and firmware do you have? please mail me! :)

title: Doesn't Appear

author: James Blanco
comment: Amazingly adorable!

author: Andrew Barker
comment: I *love* this. Please update it to include all the companions including Clara!

author: Ted Miller
comment: This is a very niche product, but so glad developer is scratching that niche.
title: For Time Lords

author: William Johnson
comment: My new favorite face.  If you love Dr Who, this is for you.  If you don't, it won't make much sense.  It works perfectly on the LG G Watch.
title: Timey-wimey

author: Jim Littrell
comment: Great job! I've shared it a few times with a couple more Whovians, and they enjoy it just as much.
title: Very nice!

author: Steve Marsh
comment: Still don't know what time it is.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: Added a picture in the description that should explain it all a bit better ;P I hope this helps

title: Awesome

author: Lori Paparteys
comment: Really well done!!! Awesome artwork with the Doctors. Absolutely adorable!
title: Love it!!!

author: nevermore
comment: Just brilliant
title: Brilliant

author: Steven Brady
comment: Adorable!

author: Gaz Tremas
comment: A must for every Doctor Who fan with a smart watch. Clean design,  and very cute!
title: A great watch face

author: Michael Felleman
comment: This watch face makes me very happy.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: It took a while, but FINALLY the update is here - be prepared for baddies and allies randomly popping up on your watchface ;)

title: So cool!

author: April Diaz
comment: I cant see it and as far as read on the commentents ots awesome but i cant tell yet.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content:
it's for android wear devices only!
support for phones will eventually come in the future (in form of a widget).

title: Cant see it on my LG phone

author: Hudminer
comment: But i dont have dat device thx anyway

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: I'm trying to create and implement a widget with the same same function as the watchface... I'll let you know if/when I succeed! ;)

comment: wonderful even TOM baker
